## Discussion

Callbacks to the render handler stop after calling [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioGeneratorController/stop()]. There may be a short delay between when you call `stop` and when the callbacks actually stop.

# stop()

**Instance Method**

Stops playback of the render handler.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func stop()
```

## Discussion

Callbacks to the render handler stop after calling [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioGeneratorController/stop()]. There may be a short delay between when you call `stop` and when the callbacks actually stop.
title: stop()
